title: Worlds Pick'em
body:
> New Ultimate Perfect Pick Reward
> 
> Should the Runeterra gods smile in your favor and you manage to select every winner from Group Stage to the Finals correctly, you'll walk away with the >Ultimate Pick’em prize: three Ultimate skins including DJ Sona, Spirit Guard Udyr, Pulsefire Ezreal.

And what about those unlucky souls who already have them?

replies.body:
Seems to me someone's a lil confident ; )

Still, considering I too own 2 of the 3 and I'm _totally_ going to nail it this year, I too would like to know what happens.

> [{quoted}](name=Nijiiyo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ybKbgyfK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-10T16:34:36.971+0000)
>
> On the other hand, considering I own 2 of the 3 and I'm totally going to nail it this year, what then?

I just asked that, what happens if the winners already own them

I found this:

>The reward for a perfect pick is a **Cache** containing all 3 Ultimate Skins. Including DJ Sona, Spirit Guard Udyr, and Pulsefire Ezreal.

If that means they are Permanent Shards, then you'll probably be able to disenchant them for 4875 orange essence all up. That's not too shabby at all.
Awww sweet 4.8K orange essence and a side of despair of the amount of RP I wasted {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Maybe, if you already have them, leave the prizes for people that don't?

It's like when rich people play lotteries.
Can someone send me the link to how you can pick T-T
